ComicInfo.Tags: Natongo,Tuaregs,Brothers of the Spear,Dan-El,Queen Tavane,Queen Zulena
ComicInfo.Title: Harvest of Fear
ComicInfo.Summary: Harvest of Fear: Nagopa and his witch-men use their dwarf slaves to surreptitiously fire the granaries of Tungelu and Aba-Zulu. When Dan-El and Natongo are absent seeking aid from King Molithi, the witch-men send in Tuaregs to capture the capital and the queens. Slipping into the city, Dan-El and Natongo rescue the queens, who join them in their fight. With support from Molithi they retake the city, routing the witch-men.
